segments.text: David , do you think which team will get the champion tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is hard to guess now . Both of the teams chose the excellent players this time . I guess the game will end in a tie . They are equally matched .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am so nervous now . What a terrific game !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to say , because each team has my idols .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! AC wins . It is a close shave , you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will never forget this match . The angle is so terrible and so correct .
segments.speaker: S1
